eu.stratosphere.nephele.util

Class StringUtils

  • java.lang.Object
    • eu.stratosphere.nephele.util.StringUtils

  • public final class StringUtils
extends java.lang.Object
    Utility class to convert objects into strings in vice-versa.
    Author:
    warneke

      • hexStringToByte

        public static byte[] hexStringToByte(java.lang.String hex)
        Given a hex string this will return the byte array corresponding to the string .
        Parameters:
        hex - the hex String array
        Returns:
        a byte array that is a hex string representation of the given string. The size of the byte array is therefore hex.length/2
